Concordance Table: H0 to SITC Rev. 2

Source: R/data.R
H0_S2.Rd

Concordance table from HS 1988/92 (H0) to SITC Rev. 2

H0_S2

Format

A data frame with 5,017 rows and 4 variables:

HS 1988/92 Product Code

Harmonised System HS 1988/92 (H0) Product code.

HS 1988/92 Product Description

Harmonised System HS 1988/92 (H0) Product description.

SITC Revision 2 Product Code

Standard International Trade Classification SITC Revision 2 Product code.

SITC Revision 2 Product Description

Standard International Trade Classification SITC Revision 2 Product description.

Source

https://wits.worldbank.org/product_concordance.html

Examples

H0_S2

#> # A tibble: 5,017 x 4
#>    `HS 1988/92 Produ~ `HS 1988/92 Product~ `SITC Revision 2~ `SITC Revision 2 P~
#>    <chr>              <chr>                <chr>             <chr>              
#>  1 010111             Live pure bred bree~ 0015              Horses, asses, mul~
#>  2 010119             Live horses, other ~ 0015              Horses, asses, mul~
#>  3 010120             Live asses mules an~ 0015              Horses, asses, mul~
#>  4 010210             Live pure-bred bree~ 00111             Bovine species pur~
#>  5 010290             Live bovine animals~ 00119             Bovine species oth~
#>  6 010310             Live pure-bred bree~ 0013              Swine, live        
#>  7 010391             Live swine weighing~ 0013              Swine, live        
#>  8 010392             Live swine weighing~ 0013              Swine, live        
#>  9 010410             Live sheep           00121             Sheep, live        
#> 10 010420             Live goats           00122             Goats, live        
#> # ... with 5,007 more rows
